description: Offering a restaurant, free sauna and indoor pool, Victoria & SPA Hotel Minsk is located in Minsk, a 5-minute walk from Victory Park. A shuttle service to the airport is available at an additional cost.The restaurant serves Belarusian and European cuisine. Special and children's menus are available on request.Kindness and cordiality are the main principles of our staff, so every guest is extremely important to us!We speak your language!

description: These modernly decorated, self-catering apartments are located in the historic centre of Minsk and come with free Wi-Fi. Minsk Airport is a 40-minute drive from the apartments.  Guests can request an airport shuttle for an extra charge.

title: DoubleTree by Hilton Minsk
description: DoubleTree by Hilton Minsk is located in the heart of Minsk next to the historic centre within a 5-minute walk of Nyamiha Metro Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. You can admire beautiful city views through the large windows and feel at home with a flat-screen TV and a desk with ergonomic chair in all rooms. The private bathroom features walk-in shower and complimentary toiletries. Guests can enjoy 36 days aged beef, fresh fish and seafood, Pan-Asian and Mediterranean cuisine in the on-site restaurants, as well as pick up the perfect wine pair from the rich collection in Ember restaurant or Ember 7th Heaven terrace with a stunning view. The lobby-café Beans&Leaves with a sun filled terrace is the ideal place for business meetings, pleasant get-togethers, and a cup of coffee or an open-air summer lunch. Sky Lounge BAR:DOT XX1, located on the 21st floor, offers biggest selection of champagne and signature cocktails, live music and DJ-sets, sparkling atmosphere and vibrant parties. You can also enjoy impressive sunset views of the city. A modern 24-hour fitness centre is available to guests as well as a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel has a fully equipped conference hall for up to 350 persons as well as complimentary 24-hour business centre. The Central train station is 3.5 km from the hotel. Minsk International Airport is located 45 km away.

The private bathrooms come with a bath and shower, hairdryer and a bathrobe. Some rooms have a garden view. Other facilities offered include a shared lounge and shops (on site). National Art Museum, Kupala Theatre and Republic Palace are located nearby. The distance to Minsk National Airport is 40 km from the property, and Minsk Train Station is 1 km away.

title: Renaissance Minsk Hotel by Marriott
description: Renaissance Minsk Hotel by Marriott is the first hotel in Belarus of the famous international hotel chain Marriott.Renaissance Minsk Hotel by Marriott features a sauna, fitness centre, indoor pool and spa and wellness centre. Free WiFi and free parking are available on site.The hotel offers 267 rooms of different categories: from spacious, elegant style Standard room (30m2) to exquisite Penthouse Renaissance and luxurious Presidential Suite. All rooms are equipped with high speed internet access (Wi-fi), interactive TV system, mini bar, in-room safe. The hotel has 2 rooms for disabled people. Most rooms have a balcony. The modern rooms and suites offer air conditioning, a working area, electric kettle and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The spacious bathrooms provide a hairdryer. Guests can dine in the property’s Arborea Restaurant, serving European and national cuisine, or eat out in the cafes and restaurants nearby. There is also a bar on site. Room service and breakfasts in the room are provided upon request.Our Executive Lounge located on the top floor of the hotel, offers a complimentary continental breakfast, refreshments during the day along with evening hot dishes and drinks. Available for guests in rooms with Executive Lounge access (Club level and up). Business bookers will appreciate a modern business centre facilities. Grushevka Metro Station is 2 km from the property. Minsk Train Station is 2.7 km away, and Minsk National Airport is 55 km from Renaissance Minsk Hotel by Marriott.

title: Imperial Palace Hotel
description: Featuring a bar, shared lounge and views of city, Imperial Palace Hotel is set in Minsk, 1.5 km from Palace of Republic. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, bathrobes and a desk. The hotel offers certain units that feature a safety deposit box, and every room has a private bathroom and a wardrobe. At Imperial Palace Hotel all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Imperial Palace Hotel offers a terrace. The area is popular for hiking, and car hire is available at the hotel. Popular points of interest near Imperial Palace Hotel include Dinamo Stadium, Palova Arena and Minsk Sports Palace. The nearest airport is Minsk National, 44 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

The apartments are located a few metres from the Kastrichnickaya Square and the Yanka Kupala National Academic Theatre. Most of the Belrent apartments offer views over the city, and some of them feature a balcony. They’re all elegant furnished and decorated with wooden floors. All bathrooms come with a washing machine, while some of them include a spa bath. Guests can prepare their meals in the privacy of their fully-equipped kitchens. The surroundings offer a variety of restaurants and cafés, while grocery stores are also available nearby. The Holy Spirit Cathedral is 600 m away, while the Dynamo Stadium is 700 m away. Oktyabrskaya‎ Metro Station is less than 5 minutes’ walk away. Minsk International Airport is 45 km away, and a shuttle service can be arranged upon request.

U Fontana Restaurant offers European and Belorussian cuisine. A varied continental breakfast is served every morning. Guests can relax in the garden with a fountain, or visit the Finnish sauna or the Russian steam bath with a plunge pool. Minsk Train Station is a 7-minute drive from U Fontana Hotel, and Minsk National Airport is 38 km away.
